record.title: PERMISSION TO RE-REFER EXECUTIVE COMMUNICATION 1370 TO COMMITTEE ON SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that Executive Communication 1370, the Department of Transportation's final rule, Human Space Flight Requirements for Crew and Space Flight Participants, be rereferred to the Committee on Science and Technology.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Oregon?
